name: spcgf
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: mpg(s0, wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wnfc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wnfc(s0, c0)

comment: Rule of specialization, using implicit substitution. Compare Theorem 7.3 of [Quine] p. 44. (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-1997.) (Revised by Andrew Salmon, 12-Aug-2011.)
